title: Introducing: Luca Fogale
content:
This beautiful debut full length release from British Columbia’s Luca Fogale is really striking a chord with me right now.

Sound wise it reminds me of the second Ben Howard album, which I was utterly obsessed with, mixed with a slightly more polished version of Bon Iver’s For Emma, Forever Ago, maybe even a little bit of A A Bondy thrown in for good measure. Poignant and searingly honest, it’s emotive folk at it’s most endearing and heart wrenching. Check out a couple of highlights below, however if you have any sense, you’ll give the full record a listen.
